title: Iceland give huge discount to emergency service workers - find out how to get it
text:
Get the biggest daily news stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Supermarket Iceland is saying a huge "thank you" to the nation's brave emergency service workers with a special 20% off promotion.

Employees of the Emergency Services, NHS and Armed Forces, including those in Police, Fire Service, Ambulance Service, Prison Service, HM Coastguard, Mountain Rescue or RNLI, can exclusively receive the discount off shopping at any Iceland or The Food Warehouse store between 14 and 21 October 2019.

All you need to do is show either a valid Emergency Services identification or your Blue Light Card at the till and the cashier will do the rest!

Iceland's Founder & Executive Chairman Malcolm Walker CBE hailed the nation's hero emergency services as he announced the special offer.

He said: "Like everyone else, I am in awe of the amazing work undertaken by our emergency services and armed forces each and every day of the year. You are the people we all rely on when the going gets too tough for the rest of us.

"So we’d like to say a big “thank you” to all those whose work is dedicated to saving and protecting the lives of others, whether that is in the ambulance service or the wider NHS, Police Service, Prison Service, Fire Service, NHS, Ambulance Service, HM Coastguard, Mountain Rescue or RNLI and also Armed Forces."

This offer will be honoured in over 950 Iceland and The Food Warehouse stores throughout the UK.

Thirty-one emergency services are valid for this discount via the Blue Light Card. To see who’s eligible click here. Terms and conditions apply to the Iceland offer. See Iceland.co.uk/emergency-services for details.
description: You can save on shopping at any Iceland or The Food Warehouse store
